entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.6°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -39.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
